title: Particle moves perpendicular to magnetic field

content.description: A particle of charge +e and mass m moves with speed v perpendicular to a uniform magnetic field B directed into the page. The path of the particle is a circle of radius r, as shown above.
content.question: Which of the following correctly gives the direction of motion and the equation relating v and r ?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
